ReducerDefinition.Name: FileMetric
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing a FileMetric.

Parameter.Name: sizemetric
Parameter.Description: The size metric to find and return.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Coverage
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing coverage level.

Parameter.Name: granularity
Parameter.Description: The type of coverage, such as 'line', 'method', 'class', etc.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Build
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing build invocations, successes, and failures.

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Description: Either the member email or '*' to indicate all members.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Description: A string specifying the value of the Type property, or '*' to indicate all.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: UnitTest
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing unit test invocations, successes, and failures.

Parameter.Name: uriPattern
Parameter.Description: Ant-like file pattern specifying the files whose unit test data is to be included in computation.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: DevTime
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing the DevTime of the project in hours.

Parameter.Name: eventType
Parameter.Description: If '*' is supplied, then the dev time will be summed up over all dev event types. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: memberEmail
Parameter.Description: If '*' is supplied, then the dev time will be summed up over all project members.

Parameter.Name: uriPattern
Parameter.Description: Ant-like file pattern specifying the files to be included in computation. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: StraightLine
ReducerDefinition.Description: Draws a straight line on the plot. The line can have a slope that can be adjusted by using the delta parameter.

Parameter.Name: initialValue
Parameter.Description: The initial Y value for the line.
